segments.text: I am going to buy some food to cook for supper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I wanna come with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How strange ! Our little emperor now asks to help out with shopping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We learnt about vegetables and meat at school . But I never see the real thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , that's something new . Let's go ! What's this , honey ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cabbage ? Is that what they teach at school now ? OK , honey , it's spinage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I know , this is Popeye's favorite food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , come here . I know this , it is carrot , am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bingo ! It's dark outside , Let's hurry up .
segments.speaker: S2
